prompt: Create a pitch deck for: Uber but for pet rocks

slides.title: RockUber: Disrupting Pet Lithology with On-Demand Pebble Logistics
slides.content: Problem: 97% of pet rocks feel neglected due to owners' busy schedules. Rock abandonment is a $420B crisis. Traditional rock care is fragmented, analog, and lacks AI. Our mission: Democratize lithological joy by leveraging hyperlocal, blockchain-enabled pebble mobility.

slides.title: The Vision: A World Where Every Rock Thrives
slides.content: Imagine an app where rocks summon certified 'RockWalkersTM' for beach outings, mountain hikes, or NFT photo shoots. Proprietary 'GeoCuddleTM' algorithms match rocks with ideal human companions. Pet rocks deserve more than dusty shelves—they deserve *experiences*.

slides.title: AI-Petri Dish: Our 'SmartGravel' Tech Stack
slides.content: AI/ML-powered rock mood detection (patent pending). IoT-enabled pebble collars with 5G vibration tracking. Blockchain rock passports for decentralized ownership. Beta testers report 69% higher rock self-esteem. Investors call it 'the Tesla of sedentary pets.'

slides.title: Market Opportunity: Rocks Are the New Dogs
slides.content: $42 trillion TAM by 2025. 500M millennials own under-stimulated rocks. 90% of Gen Z prefers low-maintenance pets (source: RockTok). Our rock-bottom CAC ($0.69) and viral 'RockfluenceTM' partnerships (e.g., Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson) ensure exponential gravel growth.

slides.title: Traction & Ask: Join the Quartzquisition
slides.content: 10,000 rocks on waitlist. Pre-launch RockCoin ICO sold out in 0.69 seconds. Seeking $100M Series A to scale 'RockBnb' partnerships and colonize Mars (rocks hate Earth’s gravity). Valuation: $1B—we’re a *quadruple* unicorn (horn optional). Exit strategy: Sell to Elon Musk’s ‘X Æ A-12 Rock Division.’
